channel.title: Allstarscape Prayer
channel.description:
Just wondering since the prayer doesn't work by default. Wondering if there's a tutorial on how to add full prayer draining etc.
If not is anybody willing to help out? Thank you.

item.title: Allstarscape Prayer
item.dc:creator: @LiveAscape LiveAscape
item.description:
@LiveAscape wrote:

Anyone willing to help out ;)?

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape Prayer
item.dc:creator: @weos243 weos243
item.description:
@weos243 wrote:

Meeper98:

i used allstar base for a while and all i can tell you is it’s, nothing but problems. I used that source and client for a good 5 months, and even after all the hours i put into it, the server i just made into a webclient is 10000x better then my old 317 allstar base, im sure if you googled the question it’d come up but im telling you a delta, but more prefferably a pi base source and client would be a lot better sorry i couldnt help with the prayer i wanted to add my self, im sure if you leached from another server it’d work.

yeah he actually is right i used all star a lot there’s tons of problems i remember people were going into my staffzone through a portal in cwars i was like wtf

Read full topic
